Bohot mock kiya hai ek doosre ko poore time. Thanks apni mess mai hamesha extras khilane ke liye; tujhse acchi party karna and karwana poore campus mai kisi ko nahi aata. Hopefully Blore mai milenge jald hi!!!

text: Auntyyyyy
author: Soumya  Gupta

text:
Auntyyy!!
Inserting "I'm cute about everything" gif hehe. As you have mentioned that you exaggerated your hatred for the cheems language, the rest of "memoir" will be in the same. First of amll, temre surmname ki spellimng galat hai huehuehue. We first met through Gavish, during our weekly post COM CCD timepass xD, since then it's the DUGC fam huehue. We spent a very little time together in person, there were the 2 pizza hut trips xD and some sudden choco lava/mama mio plans, unfortunately, Campus aane ka mauka to nahi mila mujhe but chill hai. Thanks a lot for listening to my never-ending rants and for always keeping the virtual company throughout the lockdown, ab to khair to busy ho gayi hai ;) ;) (milky bar fan huehue). I know that our views seldom align with each others', it makes me wonder how are we even friends kyunki literally bohot kam baat pe agree karte hai apan hehe. Really sorry for putting you on ignore, it was very childish of me (just like jake hehe). You know how tough it is for me to write itna saara text, isiliye bss ab aur nahi hehe, I also stopped using cheems language after that one line so insert the extra 'm's wherever necessary.
AmEx
DataAnalyst
Paisa
Hugs
Mountains

text: Tu bekar snipe karta hai huehuehue
author: Soumya  Gupta

text:
Feb'19 - I, VT, tushy were planning a trip in CCD and a guy walked in, coming from library, we asked him a pen and he said ki "nahi hai mere paas", I thought ki banda to pakka jhooth bol raha hai, library mai pen like kaun nahi jaata wo bhi just before midsems.
Fast forward to May'19, the same guys walks in, but this time in my room when I was eating lichi. This is time I knew who he was because vatsalya introduced me to him. This guy talks about all intern shit, resume mai highs and peaks, and by that gave me a complex. I thought ki straight up maggu hai yeh loddu.
Fast forward to Feb'21 - we both are planning a trip together to GOA
hahahahha SardarJi, we've come a long way. From crying on the day of HUL shortlist( for not beingyours was luck, my was tatti resume) to crying on Day1 of placements after getting the offers. I would have been more happy agar tu Flipkart hi join karta. From me asking you in summer'19, ki tu to UG AnC banega and you saying ki tu to 7 sem mai degree khatam kar dega; to me being your seconder in the elections for the same post.
Why ate een bhai!!! Kitni help kari hai tune meri, people review your resume but you essential made my resume. The Real UG AnC. The current and coming teams have big shoes to fill. Bro, you've all the smartness in the world, except street smartness , because 'subah 6 baje pi this sir' hahahahahhaha.
In the start I thought ki tu bohot maggu hai but aisa to bilkul bhi nahi nikla hehe. RR kar karke hamesha chaap deta that bhale hi boundary pe ho xD.
Itne saare lit moments hai saath, itne rants logon ke, itne CoD games( mai better khelta hoon, stats are the proof)
"No problem.
All the best for your applications."
Why ate een always huehuehue
P.S: RR kam kiya kar

Maine to socha tha ki tere saare lit dialogues ka compilation yahan daalunga but wo plan drop kar diya.
Vaise to memoir likhne ki need nahi thi, par bhai ki khushi ke liye kuch bhi. Pehli baar tumhe NCC mai dekha tha, tabhi samjh aa gaya tha ki yeh banda chaapu to hai, but saala bahut halla karta hai. Sahi mai bhai kitna halla karte ho, thoda kam kardo bhai. Jitni masti saath mai maari hai utna ek memoir mai likhna to mushkil hai, but bhai "kab itne achche friends ban gye" hahahahaha. Tere aur tandon ke bina branch mai khatam ho jaata bhai, endless chikai hoti thi. Routhe array, 381 ka pehla surprise quiz huehue.
Aage bhi aisi hi yaari bani rahegi bhai pakka, saath mai coldplay ka concert bhi attend karna hai, singapore GP bhi dekhni hai.
Ek question tha bhai - 
"When you're riding a wave, oh, won't you ride that wave to me?
When you're setting your sail, oh, can I be your seventh sea?"

Cheemineers forever and beyond

text: oata aha
author: Soumya  Gupta

text:
Dogtor Bruno fan club rise up!
Bhai yaar Tandon T_T, Bhai a fuck up 0.1 in your 1st year CPI could have changed my course of life completely. Kya karta mai akele ChE mai, kyunki eventually Mittal se bhi tere through hi baat hui thi, Tushar se bhi tere through hi baat hui. I literally wonder quite often ki agar teri BC nahi hoti to kya hota mera. Itne kaand kiye hai bhai saath ki ab to yaad bhi nahi aate ekdum se, poore time campus mai chikai, lockdown mai chikai, Goa mai chikai. Bohot maze karwe yaar tumne. Sorry kabhi agar zyada pareshan kiya ho to, SHAMA PATRO(sorry dog gif.) GOT spoiler ke liye bhi sorry xD. Tripathi ki wo meeting yaar hahaha. Bhai you are exceptionally smart and I've a learnt a lot from you. I hope ki baad mai kabhi same city mai saath rehne ka mauka mile jisse aur chikai kar paye. Trips pe to jaana hi hai bhai, har saal ek pakki xD, but next trip vaishno devi pliss. Indore aao fatafat, jalsa karenge.
I hope ki apne mai se kisiko future mai yeh memoirs padhne ki need na pade kabhi.
Raat di gedi gal risk di, ***** mai daalo apni whiskey.
What does the fox sayy....ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding ding

text:
Big brother nahi bhai, Big daddy!!Father's day ke din yeh galti nahi bhai huehuehuehue
Yeh to baat hai bhai ki bohot ladai hui hai apni, but mostly sab chudyap cheezein pe but kaafi maze bhi maare hai saath mai. Maine tumse zyada dedicated banda nahi dekha bhai, The Real Chairperson, no one could have been a better chairperson than you nor will be, and acads mai to bhai ðŸ¥µðŸ¥µ, raada hi macha rakha hai. In goa you were saying that tu BCG deserve nahi karta, but you deserve all the success in the world. The one thing which you don't deserve is, free alcohol, nay, tu alcohol hi deserve nahi karta. Quoting a dialogue from B99, "learn to handle your browns" hahahaha. 
You to pineapple + vodka - 
"So, then I took my turn
What a thing you've done
And it was all yellow"
Sorry for all the things I might've done, tbh all of them were intentional hhuehue
